attributes.additional_details:
While the need to restructure the finances of the UK is clear and apparent, targeting pensions for serving members of the Armed Forces should be and was illegal (Until 2013).

The aim of this petition is as follows:

To make the government re-think their stance on forcing members of the Armed Forces onto a pension scheme that will cost the individual money.

Protect the rights of Service Personnel that have been promised one type of pension and then have that right denied.

Introduce a new law, Protecting all members of the UK from having pensions changed without reasonable reason (Currently to save a business becoming bankrupt is acceptable, However the MOD isn't going bankrupt?)
